name: MirageAudioSystem
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room”
”Alexa, turn on Jazz Scene”
”Alexa, raise volume in living room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Mirage Audio skill is designed to control a Mirage Audio system.
It can control one or more Mirage servers connected to either our Mirage amplifiers or other 3rd party amplifiers.

Sample phrases:
Alexa, turn on Kitchen audio.
Alexa, increase volume in the Living Room.
Alexa, turn on the Beatles Scene.
Alexa, turn on Party Mode.
Alexa, turn off the Mirage System.

Installation Notes:
The skill is only available for e-series audio servers (MMS-1e, MMS-3e and MMS-5e). The skill is not compatible with A-series servers (MMS-2A and MMS-5A).
The minimum Firmware version of the Mirage audio server required is 6.1.20200515.1. Please contact your installer for information regarding updating the Firmware.
A TuneBridge account is required to link your Mirage Audio System to the Mirage Audio skill. You will be prompted to sign in to or create an account when enabling the Mirage Audio Skill.
